attributes.action: Get Manston Airport Up And Running
attributes.additional_details: An e-petition for those who would like to fly out from Manston Airport in Kent to various destinations around the world. We wan't the government to get Manston up and running! its a perfectly good airport (has one of the longest runways in the world) and is just sitting there going to waste when local people could benefit immensely from this.

rejection.details: This is a commercial matter for Infratil Limited, the owner of the airport.
